text: Elso Rivelino Carassa La Rosa (born 21 September 1974 in Callao) is a Peruvian football coach and a former player. He is an assistant manager with Sport Boys. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Callao Category:Association football defenders Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Sport Boys footballers Category:Deportivo Pesquero footballers Category:Deportivo Municipal footballers Category:Club Deportivo Wanka footballers Category:FC Spartak Vladikavkaz players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Peruvian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FBC Melgar footballers Category:Peruvian football managers Category:Sport Boys managers
title: Rivelino Carassa
